attributes.action: letterbox service for adopted children should be combined with the court order
attributes.background: I truly believe that children who have been adopted and parents who receives letter box service so have the rights to have this in there adoption order as I believe it will make a massive difference as I think letter box service keeps family's going when they feel like nothing else matters

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
